channel.title: Java unrcognized?
channel.description:
I try running my server/compiler, doesn't work.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Pz7gF.png[/img]
[b]Environmental variables: [/b] classpath
[code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_2\bin;%CLASSPATH%; [/code]
path
[code]C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Windows Live;C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Windows Live;C:\windows\system32;C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Live\Shared;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft ASP.NET\ASP.NET Web Pages\v1.0\;C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\110\Tools\Binn\[/code]
[b]Compiler code:[/b]
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]
My path looks fucked up..

item.title: Java unrcognized?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Run server code:

@echo off title Project Insanity "C:/Program Files/java/jdk1.7.0_02/bin/java.exe" -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Java unrcognized?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“anthdukaj, post:3, topic:440797”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=543470.msg3983433#msg3983433 date=1335572100]
Why is the compiler set to jdk 6_31 and your class path set to 7_02?
[/quote]

OH SHIT, I just noticed that. I changed it, now it works. Thanks man I really appreciate it.[/quote]
No problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Java unrcognized?
item.dc:creator: @anthdukaj anthdukaj
item.description:
@anthdukaj wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Why is the compiler set to jdk 6_31 and your class path set to 7_02?

OH SHIT, I just noticed that. I changed it, now it works. Thanks man I really appreciate it.

EDIT: Run server doesn’t work still. Still says it’s unrecognized. But the compiler works.

Run server code:

@echo off title Project Insanity java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause

Read full topic

item.description:
@anthdukaj wrote:

I try running my server/compiler, doesn’t work.

Environmental variables:

classpath

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_2\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

path

Compiler code:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause
